documentation.text: @dev A modifier to restrict a function to only the owner.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "This certificate hash is already on the ledger."

arguments.value: This certificate hash is already on the ledger.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "This certificate hash is already on the ledger."

documentation.text:
@dev Adds a new certificate hash to the ledger.
 Only the owner can do this.

@dev A public function to verify if a hash exists.
 Anyone can call this.
